column1: I want to store multiple names like Alice Bob Carol. What holds a list of items?

I want to store person info like name and age together. What holds key-value pairs?
I have person = {name: Alice age: 25}. How do I get Alice's age?
I want to check if something exists before using it. How do I test if a variable has no value?
I'm writing person.name but person might be nil. How do I avoid crashes?
I have name = Alice. How do I show Hello Alice using the stored name?

I have numbers = [1 2 3 4 5]. How do I get the last item?
I have fruits = [apple banana]. How do I get the total count?
